Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.AnalyticalListPage.controllerFrameworkExtensions.adaptNavigationParameterExtension
Templates.helpDescription: This method is called by SAP Fiori elements before triggering an external navigation. Application developers can override this method and programmatically adapt the parameters which are passed to the target application. Application developers can use the oObjectInfo parameter to identify the navigation context and modify the oSelectionVariant which contains the navigation parameters.

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.AnalyticalListPage.controllerFrameworkExtensions.beforeSmartLinkPopoverOpensExtension
Templates.helpDescription: This method is called by SAP Fiori elements when a smart link in a table is clicked. Application developers can override this method and invoke the oParams.getSourceInfo method to find out the information about the clicked smart link. If the application expect the framework should not handle the beforePopoverOpens event, then this method should return true. Otherwise, framework will proceed with its handling.

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.AnalyticalListPage.controllerFrameworkExtensions.modifyStartupExtension
Templates.helpDescription: This method is called by SAP Fiori elements in the startup life cycle of a component. Application developers can override this method and modify the startup object. For an example, when the application is started, the selection variant might contain some properties that are not required for this app. Such properties can be removed from the selection variant. The reverse use case is also true, where some additional properties needs to be added with certain fixed values. This can be achieved by adding these values to the selection variant.

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.AnalyticalListPage.controllerFrameworkExtensions.onBeforeExportTableExtension
Templates.helpDescription:
This method is called by SAP Fiori elements when the table data is getting exported. Application developers can override this method to add/remove the filters in the exported file.

To add new filter entries to the exported file, create an instance of {@link sap.ui.export.util.Filter} and add it to "oExportParams.filterSettings"

Templates.template:
onBeforeRebindVisualFilterExtension(
	"${sEntityType}", // string
	"${sDimension}", // string
	"${sMeasure}", // string
	{
		entityParameters: ${entityParameters}, // object
		queryParameter: ${queryParameter}, // object
		filters: [${filters}], // sap.ui.model.Filter[]
		sorters: [${sorters}] // sap.ui.model.Sorter[]
	}
)
Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.AnalyticalListPage.controllerFrameworkExtensions.onBeforeRebindVisualFilterExtension
Templates.helpDescription: This method is called by SAP Fiori elements before binding a visual filter. Application developers can override this method and programmatically modify parameters, filters, or influence sorting before the chart triggers a query to retrieve data. Application developers can also access incoming navigation contexts of the app through getNavigationContext API.

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.AnalyticalListPage.controllerFrameworkExtensions.onChildOpenedExtension
Templates.helpDescription: This method should be implemented whenever application uses onListNavigationExtension for internal navigation. In this case the implementation of this method should provide an 'inverse' mapping to the transformation implemented within onListNavigationExtension. More precisely, the identification of a child page instance is passed to this function. The implementation of this function should provide information about the list item which has triggered the opening of the child page.

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.AnalyticalListPage.controllerFrameworkExtensions.onSaveAsTileExtension
Templates.helpDescription: This method is called by SAP Fiori elements when the Share functionality is triggered. Application developers can adapt the service URL passed as a parameter to this method. Adapted service URL will be used in the 'Send Email' or 'Save as Tile' options.

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.AnalyticalListPage.extensionAPI.ExtensionAPI.invokeActions
Templates.helpDescription: Invokes multiple time the action with the given name and submits changes to the back-end.

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.AnalyticalListPage.extensionAPI.ExtensionAPI.securedExecution
Templates.helpDescription: Secured execution of the given function. Ensures that the function is only executed when certain conditions are fulfilled.

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.AnalyticalListPage.extensionAPI.ExtensionAPI.setCustomMessage
Templates.helpDescription: Provide an option for showing an own message in the message bar above the ALP table

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.ListReport.controllerFrameworkExtensions.adaptNavigationParameterExtension
Templates.helpDescription: This method is called by SAP Fiori elements before triggering an external navigation. Application developers can override this method and programmatically adapt the parameters which are passed to the target application. Application developers can use the oObjectInfo parameter to identify the navigation context and modify the oSelectionVariant which contains the navigation parameters.

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.ListReport.controllerFrameworkExtensions.beforeDeleteExtension
Templates.helpDescription: This method is called by SAP Fiori elements when the delete operation is triggered. Application developers can override this method in controller extension & perform additional checks before executing the delete operation. Method is expected to return a Promise. To veto the delete operation, promise needs to be rejected else resolved.

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.ListReport.controllerFrameworkExtensions.beforeMultiEditSaveExtension
Templates.helpDescription: This method should be implemented whenever the application needs to have a custom save functionality for multi edit scenario. The logic for save should be defined here and this method should return a promise based on whose resolution or rejection the framework would perform cleanup tasks like closing the dialog and refreshing the table data.There will be no chaining of multi edit save from the framework, if the extension is implemented then the framework will only execute extension code for save.

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.ListReport.controllerFrameworkExtensions.beforeSmartLinkPopoverOpensExtension
Templates.helpDescription: This method is called by SAP Fiori elements when a smart link in a table is clicked. Application developers can override this method and invoke the oParams.getSourceInfo method to find out the information about the clicked smart link. If the application expect the framework should not handle the beforePopoverOpens event, then this method should return true. Otherwise, framework will proceed with its handling.

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.ListReport.controllerFrameworkExtensions.modifyStartupExtension
Templates.helpDescription: This method is called by SAP Fiori elements in the startup life cycle of a component. Application developers can override this method and modify the startup object. For an example, when the application is started, the selection variant might contain some properties that are not required for this app. Such properties can be removed from the selection variant. The reverse use case is also true, where some additional properties needs to be added with certain fixed values. This can be achieved by adding these values to the selection variant.

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.ListReport.controllerFrameworkExtensions.onBeforeExportTableExtension
Templates.helpDescription:
This method is called by SAP Fiori elements when the table data is getting exported. Application developers can override this method to add/remove the filters in the exported file.

To add new filter entries to the exported file, create an instance of {@link sap.ui.export.util.Filter} and add it to "oExportParams.filterSettings"

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.ListReport.controllerFrameworkExtensions.onChildOpenedExtension
Templates.helpDescription: This method should be implemented whenever application uses onListNavigationExtension for internal navigation. In this case the implementation of this method should provide an 'inverse' mapping to the transformation implemented within onListNavigationExtension. More precisely, the identification of a child page instance is passed to this function. The implementation of this function should provide information about the list item which has triggered the opening of the child page.

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.ListReport.controllerFrameworkExtensions.onSaveAsTileExtension
Templates.helpDescription: This method is called by SAP Fiori elements when the Share functionality is triggered. Application developers can adapt the service URL passed as a parameter to this method. Adapted service URL will be used in the 'Send Email' or 'Save as Tile' options.

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.ListReport.extensionAPI.ExtensionAPI.invokeActions
Templates.helpDescription: Invokes multiple time the action with the given name and submits changes to the back-end.

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.ListReport.extensionAPI.ExtensionAPI.securedExecution
Templates.helpDescription: Secured execution of the given function. Ensures that the function is only executed when certain conditions are fulfilled. For more information, see {@link topic:6a39150ad3e548a8b5304d32d560790a Using the SecuredExecutionMethod}.

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.ListReport.extensionAPI.ExtensionAPI.setCustomMessage
Templates.helpDescription: Provide an option for showing an own message in the message bar above the LR table

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.ObjectPage.controllerFrameworkExtensions.adaptNavigationParameterExtension
Templates.helpDescription: This method is called by SAP Fiori elements before triggering an external navigation. Application developers can override this method and programmatically adapt the parameters which are passed to the target application. Application developers can use the oObjectInfo parameter to identify the navigation context and modify the oSelectionVariant which contains the navigation parameters.

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.ObjectPage.controllerFrameworkExtensions.beforeLineItemDeleteExtension
Templates.helpDescription: This method is called when the Delete operation is triggered on a table in the Object Page. Application developers can override this method & perform additional checks before executing the delete operation. Method is expected to return a Promise. Delete operation is executed only once the returned promise is resolved. In case the extension code wants to veto the Delete operation, promise needs to be rejected. Application developers can use sUiElementId property of the object passed as param to identify the smart table where the Delete operation is being triggered.

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.ObjectPage.controllerFrameworkExtensions.beforeSmartLinkPopoverOpensExtension
Templates.helpDescription: This method is called by SAP Fiori elements when a smart link in a table or form is clicked. Application developers can override this method and invoke the oParams.getSourceInfo method to find out the information about the clicked smart link. If the application expect the framework should not handle the beforePopoverOpens event, then this method should return true. Otherwise, framework will proceed with its handling.

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.ObjectPage.controllerFrameworkExtensions.onBeforeExportTableExtension
Templates.helpDescription:
This method is called by SAP Fiori elements when the table data is getting exported. Application developers can override this method to add/remove the filters in the exported file.

To add new filter entries to the exported file, create an instance of {@link sap.ui.export.util.Filter} and add it to "oExportParams.filterSettings"

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.ObjectPage.controllerFrameworkExtensions.onChildOpenedExtension
Templates.helpDescription: This method should be implemented whenever application uses onListNavigationExtension for internal navigation. In this case the implementation of this method should provide an 'inverse' mapping to the transformation implemented within onListNavigationExtension. More precisely, the identification of a child page instance is passed to this function. The implementation of this function should provide information about the list item which has triggered the opening of the child page.

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.ObjectPage.controllerFrameworkExtensions.onSaveAsTileExtension
Templates.helpDescription: This method is called by SAP Fiori elements when the Share functionality is triggered. Application developers can adapt the service URL passed as a parameter to this method. Adapted service URL will be used in the 'Send Email' or 'Save as Tile' options.

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.ObjectPage.extensionAPI.DraftTransactionController.executeSideEffects
Templates.helpDescription: checks if side effects exist for the given properties or entities and executes them. if there are pending changes in the model those pending changes are sent as a patch request with the side effect batch request. If no source property and no source entity is passed a global side effect is executed

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.ObjectPage.extensionAPI.ExtensionAPI.invokeActions
Templates.helpDescription: Invokes multiple time the action with the given name and submits changes to the back-end.

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.ObjectPage.extensionAPI.ExtensionAPI.securedExecution
Templates.helpDescription: Secured execution of the given function. Ensures that the function is only executed when certain conditions are fulfilled.

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.ObjectPage.extensionAPI.ExtensionAPI.setCustomMessage
Templates.helpDescription: Provide an option for showing an own message in the message bar above an OP table or page header. If you want to display message on page header then you should pass oMessage only keeping all other parameter as empty Note - Message bar on Page header will be shown only in display mode for dynamic header

Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.extensionAPI.NavigationController.navigateInternal
Templates.helpDescription: Triggers a navigation to another page within the application

Templates.template:
new sap.suite.ui.generic.template.lib.AppComponent(
	"${sId}", // string
	{
		id: ${id}, // sap.ui.core.ID
		models: ${models}, // object
		bindingContexts: ${bindingContexts}, // object
		objectBindings: ${objectBindings}, // object
		metadataContexts: ${metadataContexts}, // object
		validationSuccess: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		validationError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		parseError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		formatError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		modelContextChange: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		componentData: ${componentData}, // any
		forceGlobalRefresh: ${bForceGlobalRefresh}, // boolean
		considerAnalyticalParameters: ${bConsiderAnalyticalParameters}, // boolean
		showDraftToggle: ${bShowDraftToggle}, // boolean
		objectPageHeaderType: ${"Static"}, // string
		objectPageVariantManagement: ${"None"}, // string
		flexibleColumnLayout: ${flexibleColumnLayout}, // object
		inboundParameters: ${inboundParameters}, // object
		tableSettings: ${tableSettings}, // object
		tableColumnVerticalAlignment: ${"Middle"}, // string
		useColumnLayoutForSmartForm: ${bUseColumnLayoutForSmartForm}, // boolean
		objectPageColumns: ${objectPageColumns}, // object
		statePreservationMode: ${"auto"}, // string
		enableAutoColumnWidthForSmartTable: ${bEnableAutoColumnWidthForSmartTable}, // boolean
		draftDiscardConfirmationSettings: ${"...see text or source"}, // object
		collaborationSettings: ${"...see text or source"}, // object
		mergeObjectPageSectionTitle: ${bMergeObjectPageSectionTitle}, // boolean
		externalNavigationSettings: ${externalNavigationSettings}, // object
		pageDataLoaded: [function (oEvent) {}, this] // function|array
	}
)
Templates.constructorDescription:
Main class used for Smart Template(Fiori elements V2) Application Component Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

The supported settings are:

  • Properties
    • {@link #getForceGlobalRefresh forceGlobalRefresh} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getConsiderAnalyticalParameters considerAnalyticalParameters} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getShowDraftToggle showDraftToggle} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getObjectPageHeaderType objectPageHeaderType} : string (default: "Static")
    • {@link #getObjectPageVariantManagement objectPageVariantManagement} : string (default: "None")
    • {@link #getFlexibleColumnLayout flexibleColumnLayout} : object
    • {@link #getInboundParameters inboundParameters} : object
    • {@link #getTableSettings tableSettings} : object
    • {@link #getTableColumnVerticalAlignment tableColumnVerticalAlignment} : string (default: "Middle")
    • {@link #getUseColumnLayoutForSmartForm useColumnLayoutForSmartForm} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getObjectPageColumns objectPageColumns} : object
    • {@link #getStatePreservationMode statePreservationMode} : string (default: "auto")
    • {@link #getEnableAutoColumnWidthForSmartTable enableAutoColumnWidthForSmartTable} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getDraftDiscardConfirmationSettings draftDiscardConfirmationSettings} : object (default: ...see text or source)
    • {@link #getCollaborationSettings collaborationSettings} : object (default: ...see text or source)
    • {@link #getMergeObjectPageSectionTitle mergeObjectPageSectionTitle} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getExternalNavigationSettings externalNavigationSettings} : object
  • Events
    • {@link #event:pageDataLoaded pageDataLoaded} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.core.UIComponent#constructor sap.ui.core.UIComponent} can be used as well.
Templates.name: sap.suite.ui.generic.template.lib.AppComponent
Templates.helpDescription: Smart Templates Application Component
